title: The Big Four Ohhh!
description: “The Big Four Ohhh!” is the first new short story by novelist Marc Nobbs since 2007. When Dave Cartwright sees an ad in the local newspaper offering twenty-seven inches of Prime British Beef, it plants the seed of an idea which leads to a unique celebration his wife’s upcoming fortieth birthday and a night that neither one of them will ever forget.
author: Marc Nobbs
